ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Stupid Names (was Gnome Kabobs) (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, honestly, regarding the split... I think they did a good job and MAYBE need to move another 200.  In my opinion, its not that the server is crowded - on
ygData.messageBody:
Well, honestly, regarding the split... I think they did a good job and MAYBE
need to move another 200. In my opinion, its not that the server is crowded
- on Solusek Ro now, other than Sunday afternoon, we are consistently in the
top third of the least crowded, non PvP servers. The problem, in my
opinion, is that we have too many high level players. After the "split" I
can now log in to a 1200 person server (well within reasonable expectations)
but the population of lower guk is still close to 100, sol b 70 and the
planes 30-50. I think perhaps John was right that we need to learn how to
pull from the planes in order to support more people - that would help.

But as for Verant giving us more servers in order to keep population at
under 1000, frankly, I don't see it happening.

Also, the whole server split makes me sad. I lost a lot of good friends
even moving 200 people. I suppose that's the way it goes
though................



-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Monday, March 13, 2000 11:07 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Stupid Names (was Gnome Kabobs) (OT)


From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
>Sent: Monday, March 13, 2000 8:23 AM

>And this is AFTER the split...............

What split?
Taking 200 people off of the server is NOT what I call
a split. It was a nice gesture. They need to remove a LOT
more people before you can consider it a split. (say, 800 or
1000)

>Tani, 20th, 21st, 20th, 21st, 20th Bard

Faerain (my druid) made 20th this weekend!
She is having to petition for the last name she has
wanted ever since last May -- Wanderer

Her and her monk are fighting in Mistmoore. Feel free
to come by.

>Halana 50th Shaman
>Solusek Ro

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 19 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 13 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Freeport)

<paladin>
